column4: I have a problem with the resolution on my external screen, and I need some help - anybody?
what seems to be the issue?
I have a IBM R50e, connected to a samsung LCD. I can not get the resolution higher than the resolution of my laptop (1024x768).
When I do different things only an area corresponding to 1024x768 pixels is active (unless I use 1024x768 then the entire scrreen is active)
